meanings.definition: The part of the face that sticks out above the mouth, through which a person or animal breathes and smells.
meanings.sent1: Her nose is small and cute.
meanings.sent2: I can smell the flowers with my nose.
meanings.sent3: The dog's nose twitched as it sniffed the air.
meanings.sent4: She followed her nose to find the bakery.
meanings.sent5: The clown's red nose honked when squeezed.

meanings.sent1: I can nose out the cookies in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The dog can nose out the hidden treats.
meanings.sent3: He tried to nose out the source of the delicious aroma.
meanings.sent4: She could nose out trouble from a mile away.
meanings.sent5: The detective was able to nose out the culprit in no time.

meanings.definition: The front end of an aircraft or vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The airplane's nose pointed towards the sky.
meanings.sent2: The car's nose was damaged in the accident.
meanings.sent3: The spaceship's nose cone protected it during re-entry.
meanings.sent4: The train's nose led the way through the tunnel.
meanings.sent5: The boat's nose cut through the water smoothly.
